description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Dashboard' that displays a Jira projects dashboard. It manages state for projects, filtering, view modes, and modal display, and includes UI elements for project search, filtering, and refresh. It also handles fetching projects from an API and rendering project cards and a modal for project details.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Jira projects dashboard with filtering, view modes, and project details modal.
